1.title: Lets get started

111.content:
Rodney Rodgers aka Raging_Roller69 was at a gaming convention as he was looking up tips to get into competitive streaming world.

Rodney was a 25 guy who mostly just played games all day. He got really good at several shooters and battle royal and team based games over the years and eventually he decided to get into the streaming world to see if he could make a living at it.

The problem Rodney faced was by the time he got into the streaming world it had already been popularized and filled with tons of other people most of which were far better at promoting themselves.

Rodney’s problem wasn’t his lack of gaming skills, it was his lack of interesting personality. He wasn’t overly funny, or interesting in a way that attracted new viewers. He was just....some guy on the internet playing games.

He had come to this gaming convention to study from the pros and look for a way to increase his views. However so far the day proven well...less then useful. Nobody wanted to answer his questions and lines were so long he could get any one on one time with any of the big names.

Several hours later Rodney was was sitting at the food court alone at his table feeling defeated and alone. He wanted to know how to get the fame and attention he desired.

“Hey...you’re Double R right?” A female voice suddenly said above him.

Double R or “RR” as he went by on stream was a name on his few viewers ever Called him.

Rodney looked up as he was a bit shocked. Standing in front of him was an incredibly sexy girl. She was dressed in full cosplay it seemed currently dressed as Tifa from the Final Fantasy 7 Remake.

“Oh...wow...you have seen my stream?” Rodney said a bit surprised.

“Yeah I’ve caught it a few times. You definitely have skills but your jokes kinda fall flat for me.” The girl said with a small laugh.

“Oh...yeah...still working on getting my grove together. Do you have a stream?” Rodney asked back to her.

“Well...yes and no. I do stream but not games...I’m on a different website.” She said hanging him a card.

The business card said “SailorGurlxxx” with a website below it. “Sexycamgurlz.com”

Rodney knew the site. He was a bit ashamed but he had gone there in the past. It was a very well know can girl site where sexy girls undress in front of cameras, talk to their fans naked, dress up in sexy cosplay, or some even do sexual things like masturbate on camera for money.

“Oh...Uhh...you do Cam girl stuff?” Rodney said a bit embarrassed.

“Yeah...so?” The girl said back to him.

“I’m sorry...it’s just...that stuff is kinda degrading isn’t it? I’m looking to make it in the gaming world.” Rodney replied a little condescending.

“Oh really? You know lots of can girls play games right? We just get paid more from our fans cause we aren’t censoring ourselves like those big sites do. I made more this last year than most big name streamers did.” The girl said proudly.

“Well...that’s awesome for you...I just...well don’t have big tits and long hair so that’s not gonna help me much.” Rodney said in kind of a jerk tone.

“Well maybe you don’t have the right mindset. Here take this. It’s my personal good luck charm I use on my streams. Put it on your PC for your next stream and I’m sure it will bring about a nice change in your life.” She said with a smile.

The girl took out a sexy little doll. It looked like an anime figure or something. It was dressed in tiny little booth shorts and a tight tank top.

“Thanks.” Rodney said taking it just to be nice. He shrugged it off tossing the doll in his bag as the girl waved and left.

Belatedly, he recognised it as a filter. The image was himself, but transformed into the most seductive female form. Courtney watched with amusement, as Rodney pouted and preened, fascinated by her own image. The hair moved, dancing against her shoulders, though Rodney's was cut shorter than that.

Even knowing it was an illusion, he reached up to run his fingers through the projected hair. Rikki took on the bemused look of a bimbo, as a slender arm appeared in the frame, even her nails were painted, a glossy red and copied Rodney's movements. It was starting to show its flaws, the more it was required to perform.

Courtney frowned, as she too spotted the issues. "We still have to work on that." She admitted.

"If you like you can continue to work and refine the technology." She offered.

With a wave of her hand, she invited him to shift back from his computer. As he did more of Rikki was revealed, a bodacious torso taking up more of the screen. 112.content:
The room is dark and small, lit only by faint candles as Jennifer is ordered to approach the wooden table in the middle of the room.

“You requested to see me?” Jennifer asks, her face hidden by the hood of her dark brown robe.

“Yes,” the robed man sitting at the table, “your experience in this secret society has been fruitful?”

“It has, my leader.” She responds.

“I’m glad to hear it,” the man says, “because the time has come for you to serve us in our ritualistic sacrifice towards our idols of Mars and Venus.”

“The process where once every thousand years we symbolize the delivery of a servant from Mars to Venus to keep peace within the universe?”

“That’s it,” the man said, “the tale of Yuppa. Royalty that was imprisoned and shipped out to Venus to love the rest of his days as their lowly servant. It’s this ritual that eliminates any hazards from our community from attaining our desires.”

“That’s quite a responsibility to place on me,” Jennifer said, “are you sure I can do it?”

“Are you second guessing me?”

“I would never, my guide“

“Good, I have the utmost faith that you’ll be able to succeed with this. We have your target. We think it’s someone you know...”

How about a different spin on this story?

You are Sean Larson. A very successful and good looking businessman. You are Very wealthy, intelligent, and very handsome. Everything a woman would want, and currently one of the most eligible bachelors in the your city. However you are also very aware of this and have impossible high standards for women to meet if they want to be with you. In truth all you really want in a woman is a picture perfect trophy wife.

You decide rather than continue this pointless dating experience you hold try outs for women to audition to be your wife. You judge them on every physical merit possible looking for the perfect women who is sexually perfect and also just the perfect amount of intelligence where she isn’t too dumb or too smart. Just balanced enough to satisfied and happy with pleasing you.

After dozens of try outs you reject every single woman who applies until at the very end your perfect woman finally auditions. She is everything you have ever wanted and more. When you finally agree and decide on her you two spend your first night together only to discover a little surprise...

This woman isn’t everything she seems and decided it would be better if the two of you switched places...She then swaps bodies and lives with you and you suddenly find yourself in her body and her in yours.

Now she is control of your old life and you are now her perfect trophy wife.

121.content:
With your wealth and intelligence, it wasn't necessary that you hid the goal of the interviews, and all the research. As long as you weren't 'hands-on' with any of the candidates you were free to be honest with them. Without the lies and BS of the dating scene. Their goals were just as transparent as your own.

Well... The initial broad selection was done blindly, from all the single women workers in your various companies. Selecting them from the HR reports and banding them for the age category you wanted, 20-30 year olds. The team you'd hired to manage the project was bound by a serious NDA, that'd ensure none of them would ever work in the field again, if this leaked.

You were vaguely aware that they would use your original thinning out process to guide the algorithm and refine the search. That would be a long week-end, at the beach house. The cool breeze coming in off the sea, and the pile of CV's and photographs. Your yacht bobbing at the nearby private pier always tempting you away from the task in hand.

They were already in discreet stacks for you to shuffle through.
121.title: Sounds good, let's start!

You skip introductions and begin interviews
1211.content:
To Keep things well organized you decided it was best to organize everyone by hair color. You decided to start off with darkest and end with lightest. This meant you would start with black hair, then brunette, then red/auburn, and finally end with blonde.

You really were too picky when it came to race, or ethnicity. What you cared most about was physical features. Age, height, weight, cup size, and body shape. You wanted someone physically perfect. A perfect hourglass shape, sexy in all sense of the word, but not too much to appear slutty or cartoonish.

You also wanted someone who was just the right amount of intelligent for you. Not too smart but also not too dumb. She can hold a conversation and talk about things but isn’t going to question everything and understands the nature of this relationship.

You decided to have all the candidates meet at your beach house together then one by one you would interview them privately on your yacht. Part of the agreement to every interview was each candidate would consent to stripping down to at least their bra and panties so you could fully inspect their body. You were also allowed to ask questions you felt appropriate, whether they be sexual in nature or not. You were not expecting any sexual favors from anyone, however their willingness to do something would definitely play into your choice. You wanted someone willing but not too willing...

One could say your process was cold and didn’t take love or emotions into play. You didn’t care about such trivial things. Your future spouse was going to be someone who needed to be a perfect trophy wife. Someone who’s only job is to look pretty and help your image. Perhaps one day even carry your children and if you happen to develop feelings of love along the way then even better.

As your limo pulled up into the beach house driveway there were now a dozen different candidates awaiting you. Four black hair, four red heads, and four blondes. They were the best of the best. Screened by your own team and interviewed before hand. These were the prime ones most likely to fit your needs.

Stepping out of the limo you adjusted your tailored suit as you made your way inside to introduce yourself to the ladies.
1211.title: The stacks organised by hair colour...

12111.content:
Walking into the beach house as you saw a dozen women all standing together sipping champagne. All of them dressed very nice in gorgeous dresses and gowns. You did a quick eye scan of the room pleased so far with your teams job.

To simply things the brunettes were separated with the other groups. The two darker haired ones were with the two black haired girls and the two light haired ones were with the two auburn/red heads. This gave you a nice and clean dozen to work with. You didn’t want too many girls to interview.

“Hello Ladies, thank you for coming. My name is Sean Larson.” You said introducing yourself.

All of the women smiled and waved at you. They were obviously a bit overwhelmed by this lavish luxury you had on display.

“Well I will get straight to the point. I’m looking for my wife. I’m not one to mix words or beat around the bush. You all know who I am. You know I am wealthy, powerful, and that I expect the finest and best quality in all aspects of my life. My relationships are no different. I shall meet with you each of you individually to determine if you have what it takes to be my future wife. I look forward to meeting with you all.” You said waving goodbye as you left the room.

The women in the room were definitely getting anxious. Most of them came from average backgrounds. The prospect of marrying a rich and handsome bachelor was more than most of them ever dreamed of.

A few minutes later you were on the yacht sipping on some expensive liquor as the first women on the list was brought on board.

She was an Asian girl. Very nice body and frame. Very petite and small. She was very nice and sweet and a little shy. She came from a small town and her parents were immigrants who ran a small grocery store in her home town.

She was very cute, but also a bit too shy for your taste. She was very hesitant during the body inspection and made you feel awkward for even asking. While her looks were nice her shyness and awkwardness were an automatic deal breaker as you thanked her a few minutes later and sent her on her way.

Crossing her name off the list you sighed.

“One down...bring up the next one.” You said hoping for something a little better.

1211111.content:
Deciding it's time to grasp the thistle, as you all sit around the table enjoying a magnificent meal. Your staff moving gracefully amongst you, their presence like a ripple on a pond. They effortlessly bring and take plates of food, knowing when any particular guest or host is finished, or ready.

The dessert is served, drinks topped up. You give a discrete wave of your hand, and the staff vanish. "Ladies, you're all fine women, and attractive." you start cautiously. "I am here to find a future wife, a consort to share my life. However, like any position it comes with responsibilities." Taking a deep breath you continue, "I'm not looking for someone to share the burden, I want a stay-at-home wife." Your eyes scan their faces, hunting for scowls, frowns or any sign that any of them aren't looking for that. You don't want to make them or you feel out of place or unwelcome.

"I also have a diet and exercise regime, and expect my future consort to be dutiful and attentive."

A hand is raised, and you nod for her to ask a question. Bracing yourself for the worst.

"I... I have trouble sticking to diets." she confesses, a couple of heads give a tilt in agreement. She lowers her hand resting them demurely in her lap. "But for you I'll try."

You smile indulgently, "Just trying will be enough." you answer. Before continuing, "I can always hire a fitness instructor to guide and help, if you struggle."

"You just want eye-candy?" Another asks, an edge to her voice that makes you put a dark mark against her.

"Attractive is important." you tell her frankly. "But, that doesn't mean dull, or boring. An intelligent conversation can be very stimulating."

This seems to settle a few nerves, some clearly worried you were looking for a bimbo. At the far end of the table, you see a hint of a frown and a pout on one's face. Clearly afraid she's lacking in mental stimulation. You bite back a correction, about stimulating conversation being optional. You'll have to see how this process develops.

12111111.content:
Feeling a hint of resistance from some of the candidates, a resentment of the control. But, as the provider, the wage earner it's your job to support them. That support comes at a price, and they're free to walk should they dislike the price. Your money, Your Rules! It's simple and fair, you tell yourself.

Leaving them to discuss this you go for a walk in the garden. If they can whittle down the candidates themselves, they're doing your job. Besides, you confess to suspecting there's a few manipulators in the mix, that'll undermine and neg their rivals.

The night air invigorates, as you walk. Feeling your phone vibrate, you answer it as you wander the path through the herbs, topiary and over the stone tile maze outlined in the grass. It's the R & D department, with a break-through regarding one of your projects. It's a fascinating type of electronic mind-reading and projection. The ultimate in uncrackable communication, and a way of connecting without lies or mistrust.

A polite cough, startles you. Turning, you settle your features into a more neutral expression. It's... Natalie... or Nadine. You've not memorised her name yet. She's taking a chance leaving the others to conspire behind her back. Equally, you admire her front for following you. Her mouth opens ready to speak. Her expression is far from happy, and you suspect she's about to quit the process.

Silencing her, without a word, you turn back to your phone call. If she's going to be your consort, she'll have to learn her place in things. That's second to your work, especially your research. Your geek origins, your intelligence are the power behind your success.

The researchers let you know they're ready to test the system. Turning back to Natalie? you gesture that she can talk now, as you slip your phone back into your pocket.

121111112.content:
"That was the lab." you say, hoping to dismiss her. She doesn't take the hint, "Oh, so you prefer a bimbo to a real woman who'll give you a challenge." She fires back, "I'm sure I can understand whatever your researchers were doing."

Smiling, you accept her challenge. Obviously, a complete bluff, she might know your current business, and your interests, but the details you keep carefully hidden. Offering her one arm, you gesture with the other towards the garage and the cars there.

"What say we leave them to wonder where we've gone."

Uncertainty flashes over her face, before she grasps the opportunity, and takes your invitation.

The red Lambourghini is low and fast. Giving you an opportunity to show her some of those skills she won't know about. Revving the engine, you feel the raw power as well as hear it. The vibration sending a thrill up and down your spine. It bolts from the garage like a startled stallion, powering forward. Throwing the agile vehicle down the familiar twisty seaside road, you head for the research lab.

From the corner of your eye, you see she's terrified, her fingers clenching into fists, as she hunts for something to hold. The road is straighter and duller once you hit the main road. Allowing you to speed towards the lab.

- - - - -

Identifying yourself at the gate is a formality. Even your companion is waved through without question. Your parking place is right by the doors to the building. Leaving the car, you hear her nails tremble as she opens the door. The clack lightly on the bodywork, the security guard waves you in with a nod.

Your companion insists on offering her name, "Nicole Nimmo." she doesn't want to be mistaken as an anonymous bimbo being taken to the office to be fucked and forgotten.

"So let's start the tour, and see this breakthrough." She says, the words are adressed to you, but suspect intended equally for the guard to overhear.

In either case you're happy to have her name confirmed, you didn't fancy revealing that it hadn't sunk in. That she was forgettable in the current competition. All of the women were attractive potential mates.

- - - - -

You're both greeted by Prof. Allan DeVere, whose dress sense seems to be inspired by Einstein, with his wild white hair. The lab coat, white, with a coffee stain in a couple of places.

"Oh... You're here." he seems a little perturbed.

"The message was that you'd made a break-through, and I'm curious."

Nicole giggles and simpers, playing the bimbo either for you or the Professor. "Yeah.... I'm curious too."

You take this as the rebuke she intends, knowing that as soon as you're back, she's out of the process. If she feels she's too good for you, then she needs to be reminded who has the power, and who has the need.

"Yes, yes..." he confesses, "We have made a break-through, but it's provisional, I want to repeat it, and verify it."

"This is the perfect opportunity." you tell him, presenting yourself and companion.

You can hear the particular stress he puts on his words. Underlining the importance of getting this right, with yourself as the most important person required to keep satisfied, and the research funding flowing. You both started walking to the main entry way to the sorority house. That was where you last saw the presidents and entered your names. You followed Maddie as you weaved through the crowd of sorority girls. This wasn’t the first time you followed her on some wild mission. She had been your next door neighbor since you were 4. You on the other hand were not quite so lucky. You never got that tall (only about 5’6) and you never developed much muscle. You didn’t bring a sweatshirt and had to borrow Maddie’s white and pink SoCal PolyTech sweater. With it on and your hood up you didn’t look too out of place in a sorority.

Maddie was always kind of shy. She hated doing anything without you. Which often times led her to getting you invited to the popular kids parties and such. You hated being drug to these things. You didn’t want to be there and the only person who did want you there was her but you couldn’t say no. You had the biggest crush on her. You were so stuck in your head that you didn’t realize that you had already made it to the registration table and Maddie was talking to them.

“Oh....ok....” you heard her say nervously “ oh no reason. Just curious” She says as she grabs your arm and pulls you off to the side. “ Ummmm Devon I am really sorry but I really messed up” here we go again. “What do I need to do to bail her out now” you thought to yourself.

“ What’s wrong? What happened?” You ask trying to figure out what you were dealing with.

“So, like I went to ask them about you and sort it all out and...they umm dont now your like a boy and they signed you up as their newest pledge.”

“ umm what?” You we’re starting to feel pissed off but not really surprised. Sadly this has happened before. Due to your small frame and such you often times got mistaken for a girl. It didn’t happen to often but it did happen. You remembered one awkward moment at one of Maddies high school parties where one of her jock friends accidentally slapped your ass after a night of drinking but only to be surprised that it was you and not one of maddies cheerleader friends.

“ Well you see that little note you write explaining you were a boy. Well um I may have forgotten to attach it and they registered you for realz......”

“Ummmmmmm WhAt!!” You begin to say feeling more nervous

“ and before I could explain they started talking about how they looked you up in the system and they saw that you were a “impoverished student” you know since your dad died and you became, like, poor and they gave you the Alphi Phi scholarship! That’s actually pretty cool every house in the Greek system has to take a poor student and give them a full ride and full room and board at the sorority house.”

“ but if they looked me up why did they seem that I was a boy?!”

“ well they did but they were bought it was a mistake and they changed it to be a girl”

“ why didn’t you correct them?!?”

“ Because I didn’t want them mad at me... I really want to pledge this house”

“ I dont give a damn about that! Get me out of this!”

“ Well... I tried..... and the thing is.......you see I.......”

“Spit it out!” I screamed

“That document you signed was a legally binding contract that you are who you said you were and that you accept the scholarship offer if it is awarded to you.” She said all in one panicked breath. You were stunned you couldn’t respond. “ so if we tell them what happened we could go to jail for fraud”

“.......”

“Wow...really? Whatever if bossing next around makes you happy than so be it.” You said as you signed the paper with his ridiculous quill pen.

“Very good. Now...let’s begin.” Louis said.
155311.title: Louis Explains his plan

1553111.content:
You sit at the desk as looking at Louis as he smiled.

Then you feel something your brown hair starts to grow then stops just below your upper back and it's tied back into a ponytail.

You started to talk and your voice changes into a sweet, soft feminine sounding voice and then the rest of your body begins to follow suit.

Your face chances and you can tell you are wearing light make up on it and your ears are pierced and your nose and you are wearing studs in them both.

You then see your chest expand as the feel a bra holding them in place to you they look big but they are only a nice firm C cup then your stomach becomes toned not loads but enough to tell you go to the gym and your shirt turned into a blouse.

You then feel down below as you know your genitalia has just changed and you are sitting on lace although the front feels like sort cotton as you feel your hips push out slightly.

And your trousers turn into a dress not a skimpy feminine dress but a smart office dress with a with a suspenders and a belt and smart knee high boots.

Louis smiled and said "welcome Tayler Charlotte Whitmore" now you do look nice as a tomboy and the female version of yourself although a bit younger.

Now go to your desk and start work....
1553111.title: Your body suddenly begins to change

15531111.content:
You reluctantly went to the desk just outside Louis's office and started working as his secretary although you realise quickly you are also his personal assistant too.

You spent all day answering calls, taking messages and handling correspondence
maintaining his diaries and arranging appointments

Typing, preparing and collating reports
Filing them, organising and servicing meetings (taking minutes in the meeting typing up agendas and idea's)

And liaising with relevant organisations and clients and coordinating mail-shots and similar publicity tasks.

At the end of the day Louis called you into his office and said "you've done really well today Taylor well done I'm impressed".

It felt very patronising but you think he really means it so you let it slide.

You go to the coat hook just behind your desk and collected your leather jacket and backpack that you keep your gym stuff in.

As you are walking to your apartment you decide to go to the gym like you normally do after work.

You reached the gym and almost walked into the male changing rooms but realised you can't now so you went into the female one and you opened your bag to find a pair of black leggings, a black sport bra and some black and purple sneakers.

You put them on and get on with your exercising and to be honest you felt better after you finished your workout (less stressed).

You thought about changing at the gym but decided since your apartment is only round the corner you can get changed once you get back.

Arriving at your apartment

You walked into your apartment and really nothing has changed well until you saw your degree in business that you passed in 2014 but now it says you passed it last year in 2019.

That would make you 21 or 22 as you started university when you where 18 and spent 3 years studying the business degree.

You remember Louis saying something about been younger now but 6 or 7 years younger.
15531111.title: Continue

choices: She apologised to Louis, to the empty air.
Cursing under her breath, she eased herself off the wall.
Taylor feels her memories shift again...
155311111.content:
Wishing there was more to your outfit, you leave the gym. The harsh lights of the leisure centre revealing the subtle tiger stripes of matt and gloss across your leggings and top. The sports bra, is just wrong. It's tight embrace an unnecessary reminder of your new sex. It's also too tight keeping you aware of 'the girls', but also oddly inadequate, as you feel them move while you walk. It feels like your rump is rippling too, every time you plant your feet to take a step.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/e3/09/50/...

Louis truly did a job on you. You scowl at your half-reflection in the glass. Wishing it wasn't you there, and at the same time, wanting to meet her in the flesh... just as yourself.

Trying to marshall some sort of resistance, you mentally review what you can remember of your business degree. But, the harder you press, the more they retreat. Becoming vaguer and less distinct, more like a story you've heard than something you actually experienced.

Taylor gasped, as a new memory surfaced, startling her. She remembered applying for her first job... A part-time week-end waitressing job. She even recalled the sleezy chef, and the grabby customers. Shaking her head, she tried to dislodge the memory.

"No!" she hissed to herself, "That's not me.... I'm better than that..." But her voice contained doubt.

Her first serious job came to mind, an office job. As it formed, Taylor knew it was corrupted too. She'd never wanted to be a secretary, or a P.A.... She was meant to be a manager. But the memories kept on piling up. The skirt she'd chosen, short... but not too much. Her blouse crisp and professional. Her tights plain, and her shoes with a low heel.

She recoiled from her reflection, stumbling backwards, until her back met the wall.

- - - - -

The half-reflection seemed to shimmer, indistinct. Taylor stared intently at it, hoping his true body would be revealed... That this was some weird hypnosis she could shake off by sheer will power. The figure became male, but it was Louis instead.

"The harder you fight, the further you'll fall..."

She heard the words, more inside her head, than in the real world. A taunting, mocking tone. As she watched the outline of Louis vanished, and her own returned... But worse... She was curvier. Her reflection overloaded with too ripe curves.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/fb/d4/77/...

Taylor's exploring hands quickly found that her flesh now matched the reflection. Louis had punished her further.

“I got the files didn’t I? In the end isn’t that all that matters?” You said with a defensive tone.

“No...there is always more at stake...until you learn some humility for the job instead of chasing skirts and bar room brawls you will never be a top agent here! Maybe this next job will help remind you of that!” Number 1 said slamming his fist down as he sent you away.

“This is ridiculous...they don’t care about what you do...they only care about what you are caught doing...” You said in a dismissive tone.

Your next stop was to visit your quartermaster code named Number 13. He was in the science lab along with all the other nerds that kept this place going.

“Hello Agent 19.” Number 13 said to looking up from desk as he was preparing a syringe of some kind.

“Who’s the shot for?” You asked as you stared around the room.

“Well for you of course. You’re new undercover assignment requires a bit more than simple makeup and clothes. We will need to a full genetic rework.” Number 13 said.

“Oh really? Just am I going to be posing as?” You asked.

“Did you read the file? You are going become...

info.brief_description: Stories about powerful men/boys being manipulated and bullied into becoming sexy women.
info.description:
Here is my first venture into writing my own material. These are going to be a collection of stories where powerful guys (CEO's, rich jerks, high school athletes,ect) are turned into the very women they felt entitled to. They are forced and tricked into prancing, strutting, and preening while they do all things girly and slutty. How will these once dominate men cope with having to flirt with men they once viewed as peers while the people who put them their watch on.

A few rules- No bathroom play or skat. light bondage is OK as long as it its not the main point. No children or baby chapter. Finally please make all chapters contribute to the ongoing story, if there is a "no, then what?" type chapters I will remove them.

Please enjoy.
